name: Snail Rage
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam of 2019 with the theme "What home means to you".

Protect your home from the mischievous bees and the stunning grasshoppers! Survive as many rounds of attacks as you can, as the other insects will team up in bigger groups as time goes on!

Made by:

@DaniRiwez : Twitter - Instagram

@Martigt: Twitter - Itch.io

2D Artists: Damián López and Javier Sagalés
